import React from 'react'; import profilePic from '../images/profile.jpg'; // Import your image import './About.css'; // Import the CSS file function About() { return (

About Me

Hello, I'm [Your Name]

I'm a [Your Profession] with [X] years of experience specializing in [Your Specialization]. My passion lies in [specific area of interest or goal].

Professional Background

I hold a [Your Degree] from [University Name] and have worked with [types of companies/industries]. My expertise includes [list 2-3 key skills].

Career Highlights

  • Led a team that developed [specific project or achievement]
  • Received [any awards or recognition]
  • Published research on [topic] in [journal/conference]

Personal Interests

Outside of work, I enjoy [hobbies or interests]. I'm also passionate about [causes or volunteer work].

Fun Fact

[Something unique or interesting about yourself]

); } export default About;
